name: Hellsweeper VR
abstract: Hellsweeper VR is an intense first-person action-combat experience. Gain mastery of your weapons and elemental magic, and fight of hell's twisted souls. Dare to descend into hell.

detail.app_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
detail.app_release_note:
Hi Hellsweepers,

In this latest patch, we've got another long list of QoL, balance tweaks, and progression improvements lined up for you. Hate exploding enemies? They now drop bombs before detonating, providing you with a fairer shot at survival!

We've also fine-tuned hand offsets for a range of weapons like the bow, axe, shotgun, and rifle based on your invaluable input. While it's not included in this patch, we're brewing something exciting for multiplayer and will soon launch a beta. So, stay tuned for more updates on our Discord, and we can't thank you enough for your unwavering support.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link
